messages.content: The choice is clear for Newbury and West Berkshire. The surge in Liberal Democrat support in recent elections has brought a new energy and direction to politics here in West Berkshire.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Commitment to tackle the climate emergency, increase investment in renewable energy sources, and increase social investment in the NHS, youth services, and education.
Increase investment in the NHS, youth services, and education.
Increase investment in education for your children.
A plan that defends liberal and democratic values, delivers on national interest, comprehensive education policy, investment plan for NHS, and reforms to tackle the climate emergency.

mentions.tacticalSituation: All Pro-EU alliance groups are backing Lee.

issues.brexitEurope: Stop Brexit and build a brighter future. All Pro-EU alliance groups are backing Lee.
issues.economy: Protect the future of businesses and the economy, and build our trades and relationship with the future of our planet.
issues.education: Increase social investment in education for your children.
issues.environment: Commitment to tackle the climate emergency and increase investment in renewable energy sources.
issues.governance: Addressing the political crisis where politics is considered a mess and the government has become a laughing stock.
issues.health: Increase social investment in the NHS.

leaflet.personalStatement: On the doorstep, people are telling me that politics is in a mess - they don't know who to trust and that our country has become a laughing stock.

politicalExperience.role: Parliamentary Candidate for Newbury and West Berkshire

quotes.text: If Farage and Banks can back the Tories, can you?

images.caption: Lee Dillon talking with a local resident.
